title: Doubts on College Admission
content:
I received a rank of 28K in KCET 2024 and a rank of 6K in PESSAT 2024, and I have some doubts on which college and branch I should join.

In the first round counselling of PESSAT, the cutoff for ECE was 3.9K rank and EEE was 6.5K. I could get ECE in BNMIT and RNSIT in the last round of KCET counselling, but I am not sure what to do. I can get PESU ME through KCET last round counselling as well. But i preferably want ECE. I plan to do Masters as well(idk if its in india or abroad).

So it would be helpful if you all give some advice.

comments.body:
if you taking ME you definitely have to get a masters preferably germany , if you get something like EEE or ECE you could work towrds the semiconductor industry or you could take EEE or ECE and work towards a software job but be warned it will be extremely difficult as both EEE and ECE are pretty difficult courses.

A better person than me to help you would be u/rowlet-owl.
